banner.title: Privacy & Data Protection
banner.message: We use essential cookies for authentication and functionality, plus optional cookies for preferences and device sync. Your practice data stays local-first with optional cloud sync. We never sell your data or use tracking cookies.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Required for authentication, security, and core functionality. Cannot be disabled.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Store your language preference, UI settings, and device recognition for multi-device sync.

rights.title: Your Data Rights
rights.description: Under GDPR, you have rights regarding your personal data:
rights.access: Request a copy of your data
